lessons.goal: Understand what the internet is and how it is used.

content: The internet is a global network connecting computers and devices.
Para itong 'highway ng impormasyon' na ginagamit ng lahat.
It allows people to share and get information anytime.
slides.tts_text: The internet is a global network connecting computers and devices. Para itong 'highway ng impormasyon' na ginagamit ng lahat. It allows people to share and get information anytime.

content: Browsing websites for news and information.
Sending emails and chatting with friends.
Watching videos, listening to music, and playing games.
slides.tts_text: Browsing websites for news and information. Sending emails and chatting with friends. Watching videos, listening to music, and playing games.

content: Internet makes video calls and instant messages possible.
Nakakapag-connect ka kahit malayo ang pamilya o kaibigan.
Social media helps people share updates and photos.
slides.tts_text: Internet makes video calls and instant messages possible. Nakakapag-connect ka kahit malayo ang pamilya o kaibigan. Social media helps people share updates and photos.

content: Online shopping and banking are now common.
You can book tickets or pay bills online.
These make life easier but also risky if not careful.
slides.tts_text: Online shopping and banking are now common. You can book tickets or pay bills online. These make life easier but also risky if not careful.

content: Hindi lahat ng nakikita online ay totoo.
May mga taong gumagamit ng internet para manloko.
Kaya mahalaga ang pag-aaral ng Internet Safety.
slides.tts_text: Hindi lahat ng nakikita online ay totoo. May mga taong gumagamit ng internet para manloko. Kaya mahalaga ang pag-aaral ng Internet Safety.

lessons.goal: Learn how to spot false or misleading information online.

content: Fake news is false information shared online.
Madalas ginagamit para magpaloko, manghikayat, o kumita ng views.
It spreads fast in social media.
slides.tts_text: Fake news is false information shared online. Madalas ginagamit para magpaloko, manghikayat, o kumita ng views. It spreads fast in social media.

content: People share without checking if it’s true.
Nakikita mo agad sa Facebook, Messenger, or TikTok.
Fake headlines are designed to catch attention.
slides.tts_text: People share without checking if it’s true. Nakikita mo agad sa Facebook, Messenger, or TikTok. Fake headlines are designed to catch attention.

content: Walang malinaw na source or website.
Overly dramatic titles like 'Shocking!' or 'BREAKING NEWS!'
Minsan outdated o edited ang pictures.
slides.tts_text: Walang malinaw na source or website. Overly dramatic titles like 'Shocking!' or 'Must Share Now!' Minsan outdated o edited ang pictures.

content: Check if it comes from a trusted news site.
Search the topic in multiple sources.
Look for author, date, and reference.
slides.tts_text: Check if it comes from a trusted news site. Search the topic in multiple sources. Look for author, date, and reference.

content: Nakakalito at nakakasira ng tiwala.
Pwede magdulot ng panic o maling desisyon.
Kaya laging mag-check bago mag-share.
slides.tts_text: Nakakalito at nakakasira ng tiwala. Pwede magdulot ng panic o maling desisyon. Kaya laging mag-check bago mag-share.

lessons.goal: Recognize scams and avoid being tricked.

content: Online scams are tricks done through the internet.
Ang layunin ay makuha ang pera o personal info mo.
Scammers use emails, websites, or social media.
slides.tts_text: Online scams are tricks done through the internet. Ang layunin ay makuha ang pera o personal info mo. Scammers use emails, websites, or social media.

content: Fake Online Shops – mura pero walang delivery.
Prize Scams – 'You won ₱1M!' pero hihingi ng bayad.
Romance Scams – nagpapanggap na ka-chat para humingi ng pera.
slides.tts_text: Fake Online Shops – mura pero walang delivery. Prize Scams – 'You won ₱1M!' pero hihingi ng bayad. Romance Scams – nagpapanggap na ka-chat para humingi ng pera.

content: Nanghihingi agad ng pera o bank details.
Promises na 'sobrang ganda para maging totoo.'
Gumagamit ng pressure: 'Act now!'
slides.tts_text: Nanghihingi agad ng pera o bank details. Promises na 'sobrang ganda para maging totoo.' Gumagamit ng pressure: 'Act now!'

content: Pretend emails from banks or companies.
May fake website link asking for password.
Halimbawa: 'Update your account now.'
slides.tts_text: Pretend emails from banks or companies. May fake website link asking for password. Halimbawa: 'Update your account now.'

content: Fake giveaways like 'Win ₱10,000!'
Fake accounts humihingi ng GCash/load.
Scam investment groups with guaranteed returns.
slides.tts_text: Fake giveaways like 'Win ₱10,000!' Fake accounts humihingi ng GCash/load. Scam investment groups with guaranteed returns.

content: Don’t click links agad.
Verify sender from official sources.
Kung duda, huwag sagutin o i-block.
slides.tts_text: Don’t click links agad. Verify sender from official sources. Kung duda, huwag sagutin o i-block.

lessons.goal: Learn about viruses and how to protect your devices.

content: Malware = malicious software that harms devices.
Pwedeng virus, spyware, or ransomware.
Nakakasira ng files or nagnanakaw ng info.
slides.tts_text: Malware = malicious software that harms devices. Pwedeng virus, spyware, or ransomware. Nakakasira ng files or nagnanakaw ng info.

content: Galing sa unsafe downloads or pirated apps.
Clicking unknown links or pop-up ads.
Infected USB or email attachments.
slides.tts_text: Galing sa unsafe downloads or pirated apps. Clicking unknown links or pop-up ads. Infected USB or email attachments.

content: Computer is slow or keeps freezing.
May biglang lumalabas na ads/pop-ups.
Files missing or encrypted.
slides.tts_text: Computer is slow or keeps freezing. May biglang lumalabas na ads/pop-ups. Files missing or encrypted.

content: Install antivirus software.
Keep system and apps updated.
Don’t install apps from unknown sources.
slides.tts_text: Install antivirus software. Keep system and apps updated. Don’t install apps from unknown sources.

content: Visit trusted websites only.
Don’t click on suspicious ads.
Be careful with free downloads.
slides.tts_text: Visit trusted websites only. Don’t click on suspicious ads. Be careful with free downloads.

content: Run antivirus scan agad.
Disconnect from the internet if severe.
Ask for help from a technician.
slides.tts_text: Run antivirus scan agad. Disconnect from the internet if severe. Ask for help from a technician.

lessons.goal: Learn to keep personal data safe online.

content: Privacy means protecting your personal information.
Kasama dito ang pangalan, address, password, bank details.
If exposed, pwede magamit ng scammers.
slides.tts_text: Privacy means protecting your personal information. Kasama dito ang pangalan, address, password, bank details. If exposed, pwede magamit ng scammers.

content: Use mix of letters, numbers, symbols.
Don’t reuse the same password everywhere.
Huwag i-share kahit sa kakilala.
slides.tts_text: Use mix of letters, numbers, symbols. Don’t reuse the same password everywhere. Huwag i-share kahit sa kakilala.

content: Extra security step when logging in.
Sends a code to your phone/email.
Kahit makuha ang password, di agad makakapasok.
slides.tts_text: Extra security step when logging in. Sends a code to your phone/email. Kahit makuha ang password, di agad makakapasok.

content: Limit what you share publicly.
Huwag i-post ang address, ID, or financial info.
Check privacy settings regularly.
slides.tts_text: Limit what you share publicly. Huwag i-post ang address, ID, or financial info. Check privacy settings regularly.

content: Too much info can be used for scams.
Example: travel plans → alam ng magnanakaw wala ka sa bahay.
Think before posting.
slides.tts_text: Too much info can be used for scams. Example: travel plans → alam ng magnanakaw wala ka sa bahay. Think before posting.
